Pre-Game Insights: Manager Craig Counsell told a couple of the Cubsâ€™ younger players before the game that Saturday would be a memorable day they would never forget.
Key Match Events: Kyle Hendricks tips his cap to the Wrigley Field fans after being pulled in the eighth inning of a game against the Reds on Sept. 28, 2024. (Charles Rex Arbogast/AP)
Post-Match Reflections: Hendricks, still in uniform, stood in shallow left field in the empty ballpark. Surrounded by family, he posed for photos, holding his son with the ivy and scoreboard in the backdrop, the final moments of an emotional day for the Chicago Cubs great.
Others: Hendricks ends 2024 with a 4.73 ERA over his final 17 starts after moving back to the rotation following a three-week bullpen stint.
